Education: Time travel could be used to teach history in a more immersive way, allowing students to experience historical events as they occurred.
Tourism: Time travel could lead to a boom in time-travel tourism, with people visiting famous historical sites and events.
Ethical Dilemmas: Time travel could raise ethical questions about altering the past and the potential consequences of such actions.
Time Travel Industry: A time travel industry could emerge, with companies offering time travel experiences to the public.
Time Travel Literature: Time travel stories and novels could become even more popular, as they would be able to draw on real historical events.
